title: Joshua Jackson and girlfriend Jodie Turner-Smith enjoy a romantic day out in Berlin
text:
Joshua Jackson and girlfriend Jodie Turner-Smith were far from the Beverly Hills County Registrar responsible for issuing their widely reported marriage licence as they stepped out Sunday afternoon.

The couple swapped southern California sunshine for a chilly day out in Berlin, where they enjoyed stroll through bustling Mitte - the German capital's most central, and arguably most popular suburb.

Braced for cold weather, Jackson, 41, sported a thick hooded top and red beanie hat while idling outside Berlin's Soho House with his British girlfriend.

Stepping out: Former Dawson's Creek star Joshua Jackson and girlfriend Jodie Turner-Smith enjoyed a day out in Berlin on Sunday afternoon

Joining the former Dawson's Creek star, Jodie, 33, looked equally prepared i in a distinctive striped poncho, worn over a grey hoodie and matching tracksuit bottoms.

With Jackson pointing towards the opposite end of the Torstraße, the pair appeared to be weighing up their next move as they browsed a string of stores on the busy shopping street, a popular destination among tourists.

Their appearance in Berlin comes after they secretly obtained a marriage licence in Beverly Hills, according to reports.

Well wrapped: Braced for cold weather, Jackson, 41, sported a thick hooded top and red beanie hat while idling outside Berlin's Soho House with his British girlfriend, who wore a colourful poncho

The couple were spotted getting what appeared to be the martial certificate, which is valid for 90 days.

Jodie shared a loved-up shot with her man a few days after they were spotted getting the licence, saying she 'fancied' The Affair star.

'Two people who only fancy each other a little bit,' she captioned the image, in which they sit side by side while gazing into one another's eyes.

The couple have been an item since last fall when they met at Usher's 40th birthday party in October 2018.

Mr & Mrs? Jodie shared a loved-up shot with her man a few days after they reportedly obtained a marriage licenc

After getting his big break on the popular series, Dawson's Creek, Katie Holmes claimed Jackson was her first love. The then 19-year-olds dated during the first two seasons from 1998.

In 2006 he began dating Diane Kruger, 43, following her five-year marriage to French director Guillaume Canet.

The pair called things off ten-years later in 2016.
